main event: A ground-visual observation of a distant maneuvering point of light in Covington, Kentucky on 27 June 1954.
interesting points: The observation lasted 1-2 minutes, and no photographs were taken.
The object was initially seen as a point of light, then exhibited erratic maneuvering.
The report lacks detailed comments or data, leaving the sighting unexplained.
This was part of Project Blue Book, a U.S. Air Force program for the investigation of UFO reports.
The report was transmitted between various Air Force bases for analysis.
